title: Tamagotchi meets Pokémon Go in Niantic Labs’ upcoming ‘Peridots’ game
content:
Niantic Labs started out as a division of Google working on the mobile augmented reality (AR) game Ingress, but after becoming an independent company in 2015, the company focused on AR games based on third-party media franchises (like Pokémon Go). Niantic today revealed its first original game since Ingress and Ingress Prime, called Peridot. Niantic wrote

The post Tamagotchi meets Pokémon Go in Niantic Labs’ upcoming ‘Peridots’ game appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Niantic Labs, developer of Pokémon Go and Harry Potter: Wizards Unite, is working on an original AR mobile game.
